overview: Newcomer Phillip Andr√© stars as a French sailor on an incredible, sex-gorged shore leave in William Higgins' X-rated tale of seamen on the prowl in Hollywood. "Sailor In The Wild" Brian Thompson, "A Matter Of Size" co-star Doug Weston, and a dozen other Higgins discoveries make a truly unforgettable weekend for "The French Lieutenant's Boys."
title: French Lieutenant's Boys
